meanings.definition: Permissible or lawful according to Islamic law.
meanings.sent1: Eating halal food is allowed during Ramadan.
meanings.sent2: The mosque only serves halal meals to its members.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought catching the mouse was not halal.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as halal as a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained that following the rules is halal in the classroom.

meanings.definition: Food that is prepared according to Islamic law.
meanings.sent1: My friend only eats halal meat.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant proudly displayed a halal certification.
meanings.sent3: The dog sniffed the halal leftovers with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the halal dish filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: She always makes sure to buy halal groceries for her family.
